channel.title: Need Simple Dance Command
channel.description: I need a command that will make everyone on the server begin to dance. :) and possibly say DANCE PARTY!! and they cannot stop for 2 seconds :) I lost my emotes or I would attempt to code it myself and really not sure how to make everyone do it either :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 07:41:23 pm[/size][hr]any takers ?

item.title: Need Simple Dance Command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("dance") && playerRights > 1){ dance(); }

public void dance() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; client castOn = (client)p; if(castOn.playerId != playerId) { castOn.plrText = "Everybody dance!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(####); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
